title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5703.2 - Speed limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5703.2 - Speed limits

State Regulations

The maximum speed on the vehicular crossing is 35 miles per
hour, unless otherwise posted and except where a special hazard exists that
requires lower speed as provided in section
5703.1
of this Part, and no person
shall operate a vehicle on the vehicular crossing at a speed in excess
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5703.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
